Uses of Class
com.azure.storage.blob.AccountSASResourceType

  • Packages that use AccountSASResourceType 
    Package Description
    com.azure.storage.blob
    Package containing the classes for BlobServiceClient.

    • Uses of AccountSASResourceType in com.azure.storage.blob

      Methods in com.azure.storage.blob that return AccountSASResourceType 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccountSASResourceType AccountSASResourceType.container(boolean container)
      Sets the access status for container level APIs, this grants access to Blob Containers, Tables, Queues, and File Shares.
      AccountSASResourceType AccountSASResourceType.object(boolean object)
      Sets the access status for object level APIs, this grants access to Blobs, Table Entities, Queue Messages, Files.
      static AccountSASResourceType AccountSASResourceType.parse(java.lang.String resourceTypesString)
      Creates an AccountSASResourceType from the specified resource types string.
      AccountSASResourceType AccountSASResourceType.service(boolean service)
      Sets the access status for service level APIs.
      Methods in com.azure.storage.blob with parameters of type AccountSASResourceType 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Generates an account SAS token with the specified parameters
